description: Detects dropped files with LNK double extension, which is often used by malware as a method to abuse the fact that windows hide default extensions by default.
false_positives: Users creating a shortcut on e.g. desktop
name: Suspicious LNK Double Extension Files
query: ((file.path.text:*.lnk AND file.path.text:(*.doc.* OR *.docx.* OR *.xls.* OR *.xlsx.* OR *.ppt.* OR *.pptx.* OR *.jpg.* OR *.pdf.*)) AND (NOT (file.path.text:(*\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\Office\\Recent\\* OR *\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Recent\\*))))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
frack113
